about_the_game:
Thabit mercilessly rules his kingdom in the land of Egypt, until one day he is struck by a heavy blow of fate.
The gods Isis and Osiris take pity on the young pharaoh: by building a magnificent city that offers shelter to many contented inhabitants, Thabit can change his fate.

Return to the world of Ancient Egypt and build a magical city! Earn gold and materials to be able to build houses and temples.
Collect trophies and bonuses so you can upgrade and beautify all the buildings.
Harness the four elements of water, earth, wind and fire and put your match-3 skills to work, as you'll soon have formidable powers at your disposal to advance the construction of yourcity and attract many inhabitants!

- Enchanting Match-3 game with a captivating story
- More than 100 exciting levels with many extras
- Earn trophies and complete mini games
- Construct a glorious city!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard

Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard
